name: Stuck in the Rhythm
description:
Controls

  • Move - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Left Shift - Shimmy (Makes you not miss a beat while staying still)

How to Play:

Move in rhythm to the beat! Stay within 1 tile of your partner in a directly adjacent square to increase the relationship meter!

In the event that you are adjacent to your player and want to stay in the same square, press the Shift button to do a Shimmy. This will allow you to keep your combo going and build up your meter.

Authors
  • Programming/Design - TheJaspel
  • Music - Zay https://twitter.com/ZayAltick
  • Art - GangsRobin
  • Programming - Agent Orange / Adalheidys / Searing Arrow
  • Additional Art - KrycerKris / Plessie
